description:

Welcome to contemporary living in suburban Philadelphia, 410 S Union Ave is a gem in the quiet suburb of Yeadon. This newly renovated property features stunning details including an enclosed porch and an open floorplan with tons of natural light. The first floor has been upgraded with gleaming recessed and pendant lights that adorn the home, accent walls that elevate and anchor the sun filled open concept main level. The modern kitchen is equipped with an electric stove, shelves and a built-in pantry. Crisp, clean white cabinets and a designer countertop that has a striking contrasting vein design throughout- the island a perfect centerpiece for you to enjoy entertaining friends and family open to views of your dining and living rooms. On the Upper level, you'll appreciate the upgraded flooring and contemporary design. The Master Bedroom is custom designed with a vaulted ceiling, is generously sized with tons of natural light and a large closet! Enter into a bathroom of pristine provisions; luxury tile and a shower/tub combo. The luxe designs continue into the generously sized secondary rooms. This property features a partially finished basement perfect for a bonus room and the convenience of a half bath/laundry room. Situated directly across the street from Yeadon Community Park and the Historic Nile Swim Club! Take a scenic walk in the park with trails for joggers & dog lovers, plus a playground. Less than 15 minutes from the Philadelphia Airport. This location is prime! Restaurants with local and international cuisine, boutiques, and supermarkets, this property exudes convenience! This property is in an excellent location, has a great floor plan, and incredible price. This move-in ready custom renovated home is just waiting for you to make it your next home.

description:
This stunning 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom townhome will be available for rent July 1st . This spacious apartment provides ample living space for you or your family.
The townhome features modern finishes and elegant details throughout. The open-concept living room and dining room are perfect for entertaining guests or relaxing with your family. The kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and plenty of cabinet space for all your storage needs. There is also a deck at the back of the unit.
All three bedrooms have ample closet space, providing plenty of storage options. With three full bathrooms, you'll never have to worry about waiting in line for your turn in the morning. A stacked washer and dryer unit is located on the third floor.
This apartment also comes with a private garage parking spot AND two dedicated parking spots right in front of the unit ensuring that you always have a safe and secure place to park your vehicles. Nowhere else in the Manayunk/Roxborough area will you find this!
Located on Leverington Ave between Mitchell and Pechin Streets, this townhome is situated in a prime location. You'll be within walking distance to many shops, restaurants, and entertainment options. Additionally, you'll have easy access to public transportation, making commuting a breeze.

title: Very Spacious! Beautiful 3 Bedroom 2 1/2 Bath Townhouse For Rent!
description: Here is your opportunity to rent a property that promotes warmth and comfort that you can call home. This inviting townhome is located in the beautiful Deer Creek community with a location that cannot be beat. From the moment you enter you will feel welcomed into this spacious 3 bedroom, 2 1/2 bath townhouse with additional 23' x 21' loft that could be a 4th bedroom. The foyer, with double coat closet and hardwood floors, provides convenient access to the powder room and the 1-car garage. The living room provides a comfortable area to relax and unwind. It is open to the dining area and features a gas marble fireplace, recessed lighting, bay window, and sliding glass doors to a deck. You will love the eat-in kitchen with new quartz countertops, subway tile backsplash, space saving built-in microwave, double sink, and dishwasher. The second floor provides a nice sized primary bedroom with cathedral ceiling and a private bath with double vanity, stall shower, and a jetted soaking tub. The additional two bedrooms feature double closets and access to the hall bath. The laundry closet can also be found on this level making laundry day a faster task to accomplish. The third floor loft completes the living space and can be used as an extra bedroom, game room, TV room, and so much more. The possibilities are endless. You will find plenty of storage in this home with closets, garage, and plenty of space in the large basement. The newer windows and the 2-zone HVAC system help to keep energy bills down while providing a comfortable temperature. Some other great features are the whole house sprinkler system, 9' ceilings, and the private driveway with parking for 2 additional cars. The community features a tot lot playground and plenty of places to walk and enjoy nature. It is centrally located within minutes of Valley Forge National Park, municipal parks, King of Prussia Mall, movie theater, restaurants, and so much more.
